Professional Summary

Passionate developer and content creator with a focus on modern web technologies and AI integration. Founded NosytLabs in 2025 as a platform to showcase projects and share knowledge with the developer community. Experienced in building responsive web applications, creating educational content, and exploring emerging technologies. Committed to continuous learning and contributing to open-source projects.

Experience

Founder & Developer

2025 - Present

NosytLabs

  • • Founded and developed NosytLabs portfolio website using Astro.js, React, and TypeScript
  • • Created unique Windows 95-inspired interface (NosytOS95) with working applications and games
  • • Developed multiple web applications including prompt engineering platform and API integrations
  • • Implemented responsive design, performance optimization, and SEO best practices

Content Creator

YouTube (@TycenYT) & Kick.com
